author: Mercer
description: **Astra Yao** is an **S rank Agent** with the **Ether attribute** who belongs to the **Support Specialty** and who is part of the **Stars of Lyra faction**.

weapons.name: Elegant Vanity
weapons.description: **Best in Slot in all situations**, provides Astra with **Energy Regeneration**, a **stacking 10% DMG Boost** for the whole team and a massive **30% <atk> ATK Main Stat** to help her with reaching her <core> **Core Passive Requirement**, but due to the strength of A Rank Support W-Engine's, this W-Engine is somewhat overkill and Astra can reach full potential without it.

weapons.name: Bashful Demon
weapons.description: The best peforming A Rank W-Engine for Astra, providing a generous **3.2% Combat <atk> ATK% boost** that **stacks up to 4 times** at S5 while having a **ATK% Main Stat** to help out with Astra's <core> **Core Passive requirement** making it all around the best.

weapons.name: Kaboom the Cannon
weapons.description: The 2nd best A Rank W-Engine for Astra, almost has the exact same passive bonuses as Bashful Demon but requires way more careful play to maximise it, requiring constant **Quick Assists** to keep its effect up, it also doesn't have access to a **ATK% Main Stat** making it harder to fulfill Astra's <core> **Core Passive requirement** but still a servicable option if you don't have Bashful Demon.

four_pieces.name: Astral Voice
four_pieces.description: Astral Voice was simply made for Astra, she has no issue mainting its **Quick Assist** requirement, making her have full uptime on its **24% DMG Boost** at all times

two_pieces.name: Swing Jazz
two_pieces.description: Her best 2-Pc set, gives a very needed **20% <er> Energy Regen bonus** helping her **Quick Assist** more often

two_pieces.name: Hormone Punk
two_pieces.description: A potential option for people running Kaboom the Cannon that need more <atk> ATK% to reach Astra's <core> **Core Passive** requirement

stat.sub_stats:
- For Crit based usage: <atk> ATK%/<atk> Flat ATK until Passive Cap > <cr> Crit Rate = <cd> Crit DMG > <pen> PEN
- For Anomaly based usage: <atk> ATK%/<atk> Flat ATK until Passive Cap > <ap> Anomaly Proficiency > <pen> PEN
stat.baseline_stats:
<atk> ATK: 3429+ (34925 is the <atk> ATK cap for her Core Passive)
<er> Energy Regen: 0%+ - 130%+ (Depends on W-Engine and Disk Main Stat choices)

extra_sections.title: Core Passive cap and Energy Regen
extra_sections.description: Astra Yao needs **at least 3429 BASE ATK** to fulfill her <core> **Core Passive** requirement, this should be your **highest priority**. After getting 3429 <atk> ATK you should focus on getting as much <er> Energy Regen as possible with Min/Maxing stats, the more ER% you have, the more **Quick Assists** you can trigger which will make your rotations easier with Astra on the team.

skill_priority.description: Her <special> **EX Special** has the highest priority for upgrades due to **increasing everyone's DMG and Crit DMG** up to **20% and 25% respectively** while her <chain> **Ultimate** will simply provide **more healing** and more chip damage.

skills.title: Special Attack: "Windchimes & Oaths" & Idyllic Cadenza
skills.description:
### Press <special> to activate:
Quickly move away, then release **Tremolo**, dealing <ether> Ether DMG, and enter the **Idyllic Cadenza** state. Hold <special> to **charge** during activation, **drawing enemies in**, and follow up with 1 to 4 **Tremolos** depending on the charge duration. A **Quick Assist** will be triggered when this skill hits an enemy.
skills.explanation: Astra's bread and butter Ability, 99.9% of the time you will use this skill once at the start of the fight and simply reap the benefits it provides for the rest of the fight for free.

skills.title: Ultimate: "Fantasian Sonata"
skills.description:
### When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <chain> to activate:
Use song to channel energy into a blast, dealing massive <ether> Ether DMG, and restoring **HP** to all squad members.
After the skill, Astra Yao enters the **Idyllic Cadenza** state and the **next two Quick Assists** will be replaced by <chain> **Chain Attacks.**
skills.explanation: Astra's only other Ability you'll be using, mainly used during Burst Phases to give yourself more <chain> Chain Attack damage and healing.

mindscapes.description: Provides a stacking **All-Attribute RES** shred up to **18%** and **a free 1000 Decibel boost** while entering the field for the first time.
Increases the buff gained from her **Core Passive by 400 ATK**, making the complete buff **1600 ATK** and providing some **extra damage** whenever anyone **Quick Assists**.

extra_sections.title: General Notes on Team Building
extra_sections.description: Astra Yao at this current time fits into every team, even teams that do not need <atk> ATK like Yixuan, fitting in Astra into any team will always be a damage gain somehow
